name: Funtoccio
description:
You may not be rich in money, but rich in funny! 

Make decisions on how to continue your play, uncover different paths and experience all kinds of wacky twists and turns.

Funtoccio is a single player narrative exploration game in which you slip into the role of a puppeteer and can tell your puppets what to do. But don't be surprised when things don't turn out as you would've thought!

This game demo currently offers about 10 minutes of play time and many different paths to explore.

Controls:

On a keyboard you use the A&D keys to move around and the arrow keys & enter for selecting an action. 
When playing with a gamepad you can walk around using the left stick and select actions with the right stick + the south button. 

Team: 

Caroline Peter - Production Manager, Game Designer,  Animator, Supporting Programmer

Maike Nagel - Creative Director, Character Artist

Momo Hernandez - Main Programmer, 2D Artist

Silke Weßelmann - Environment Artist, Lighting Artist, Sound Manager

Yannic Bechthold - Composer

Ben Haberland - Sound Designer
